segments.text: What sport do you like the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . Did you play when you were a kid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I played until I graduated from high school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I tried every position , but the last few years , I played third base .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate third base . It's scary when the ball is coming at you so fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was scary at first , but after awhile , I got used to it . If you have fast reflexes , then it's not really a problem . What position did you play ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I played outfield . I hated the infield because I never figured out all the bounces .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I could play again , but there isn't much opportunities around here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm on a softball league . It's not fast pitch , but it's still fun . You wanna join our group ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We play either Tuesdays or Thursdays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds pretty fun . I'll come out and join you next time .
segments.speaker: S2
